### Sample Data

```js
const sampleData = {
  name: "Profile Picture",
  image: "https://arweave.net/UwlQKt4Hh86pIA8g_3GX70uj6I1FOLsADNONpeH9jUk",
  traits: ["Style", "Look"],
  values: ["Cool", "Relaxed"],
};

const dataInBytes =
  "";
```
